attributes.action: Stop commiting Britains over committed armed forces in others theatres of war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having served in the first Gulf War and experienced the struggle to cope, only to be 'rewarded' by options for change, which vertually halved the armed forces. Is it time for poloticians to listen to the 'hands on people' and realise that this over commitment in the persuit of world peace or empirism, is putting the nations home defence at risk if strategic incident happened closer to home.
